Leonardo da Vinci: Bringing back Leonardo da Vinci would be an amazing opportunity to learn from one of the greatest minds in history. He was a polymath, with interests in fields such as art, science, engineering, architecture, music, mathematics, anatomy, geology, astronomy, botany, writing, history and cartography. We could learn a lot from his insights and discoveries in these fields.

Albert Einstein: Bringing back Albert Einstein would be an opportunity to learn from one of the greatest scientists of all time.
